short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes web content with an open-source LLM service (Shale-Serve API).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension that summarizes website content with an open-source LLM through the Shale-Serve API. It can also be used as a code explainer for any individual piece of code or repository on GitHub. 

To use it, simply click the extension to summarize the whole web page, or select some text on the web page first and then click the extension to summarize a sub-portion of the web page.

The Shale-Serve API queries an open-source large language model that is widely used. For more details, please visit https://shaleprotocol.com.
